meanings.sent1: His brawniness helped him lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The wrestler's brawniness was evident in his muscular arms.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy tried to imitate the brawniness of the big dog.
meanings.sent4: Her determination gave her the brawniness to overcome any obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The brawniness of the lion was unmatched in the jungle.

meanings.definition: The quality of being strong and muscular.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's costume highlighted his brawniness.
meanings.sent2: She admired the brawniness of the bodybuilder at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked delicious, but its brawniness surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: His brawniness in negotiations made him a formidable opponent.
meanings.sent5: The brawniness of the oak tree's trunk was impressive.
